text: The 1991 Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place on March 8–10, 1991 at Cobo Arena in Detroit, Michigan. Eastern Michigan defeated , 67–66 in the championship game, to win its second MAC Tournament title. The Eagles earned an automatic bid to the 1991 NCAA Tournament as #12 seed in the East region. In the round of 64, Eastern Michigan defeated Mississippi State 76–56, and followed that with a 71–68 win over to earn its first NCAA Tournament Sweet Sixteen appearance in program history. ==Format== Eight of nine conference members participated, with play beginning in the quarterfinal round. was left out of the tournament field. ==Bracket== ==References== 1991 Category:1990–91 Mid-American Conference men's basketball season MAC Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1991 MAC Men's Basketball Tournament
